name: unity-mcp (CoplayDev)
description: [项目级] Unity MCP acts as a bridge, allowing AI assistants (like Claude, Cursor) to interact directly with your Unity Editor via a local MCP (Model Context Protocol) Client. Give your LLM tools to manage assets, control scenes, edit scripts, and automate tasks within Unity.。来源: https://github.com/CoplayDev/unity-mcp

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Unity MCP acts as a bridge, allowing AI assistants (like Claude, Cursor) to interact directly with your Unity Editor via a local MCP (Model Context Protocol) Client. Give your LLM tools to manage assets, control scenes, edit scripts, and automate tasks within Unity.

来源: https://github.com/CoplayDev/unity-mcp
语言: C#
Stars: 6083

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
CLAUDE.md
CustomTools
CustomTools/RoslynRuntimeCompilation
LICENSE
MCPForUnity
MCPForUnity/Editor.meta
MCPForUnity/Editor

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
* **Natural Language Control** — Instruct your LLM to perform Unity tasks
* **Powerful Tools** — Manage assets, scenes, materials, scripts, and editor functions
* **Automation** — Automate repetitive Unity workflows
* **Extensible** — Works with various MCP Clients
